subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The two New York stadiums will become the 18th and 19th major league parks to open since the retro design trend began with Baltimore's Camden Yards in 1992.
snippet: The two New York stadiums will become the 18th and 19th major league parks to open since the retro design trend began with Baltimore's Camden Yards in 1992.
